original_text:
Book of Souls
Spearhead Studios, ex GiG Games, l’autoproclamato ‘game changers’, ha fatto un passo avanti e ha aggiunto una svolta al gioco di base dei classici Book of, prodotti principalmente da Novomatic con i suoi Book of Ra. Gli Snake Wilds sono una caratteristica casuale nel gioco di base dove un certo numero di wilds sono aggiunti a posizioni casuali sui rulli per fornire più potenziale per segnare una vittoria.
Book of Souls è una video slot con cinque rulli, tre file e 10 linee di pagamento fisse. Le dimensioni della scommessa partono da 0,10 crediti per i rulli bassi, mentre i rulli alti possono aumentare fino a 100 crediti. Alta volatilità non significa bassa RTP come dimostra lo studio eseguito su questa Slot Machine, che ha definito l’RTP della Slot del 96,90%. Per stare al passo con i tempi, quelli di Spearhead hanno ottimizzato la Slot per i cellulari, ma ha un aspetto e una giocabilità altrettanto buona su un PC desktop.
Una grafica alla Indiana Jones
Come previsto, la slot è a tema avventura, con l’eroe che è Lara Jones che entra in un antico tempio Maya. L’archeologa trasformata in cacciatrice di tesori è alla ricerca del mistico Libro delle Anime, che può sbloccare le leggendarie ricchezze nascoste all’interno della gigantesca struttura di pietra. Naturalmente, sui rulli c’è un cattivo che cerca di impedire a Lara di portarsi a casa le ricchezze. L’ambientazione del gioco si trova di fronte all’ingresso del tempio nascosto con i simboli della paga appoggiati su pietre che devono essere rimosse per poter entrare. Le pietre tremano ad ogni nuovo capitombolo di simboli di pagamento, quindi possiamo già definire la presenza di Tumbling Reels, mentre una colonna sonora ricca di suspense accresce le aspettative di trovare i vasti tesori.
L’obiettivo della Slot è quello di trovare un Libro sacro delle Anime – una chiave per i misteri e le ricchezze Maya. Accanto a Lara, un membro di un’organizzazione segreta è anche alla ricerca di questa fonte di potere, quindi c’è un po’ di attrito e di tensione tra la protagonista e l’antagonista. Ci sono anche maschere e totem sacri Maya, oltre a icone stilizzate di carte.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Tutti i simboli di pagamento sono tenuti su pietre giganti che rotolano sulla finestra di gioco al posto della solita rotazione del reel set. I simboli dal valore più basso sono quelli delle carte in stile Maya che prevedono un range dal 10 all’Asso, mentre i simboli premium sono due artefatti Maya, il cattivo che mette in campo una pistola e la stessa Lara Jones. La Slot Machine paga per un singolo cinque di una gamma da 10x a 500x la puntata. L’antico Libro delle Anime, dal design intricato, è il simbolo Scatter e Wild sui rulli.
Colpisci almeno tre scatters ovunque sui rulli per innescare 10 rotazioni libere, che possono essere innescate nuovamente all’infinito. Inoltre, una vincita di 2x, 20 e 200x viene assegnata per tre, quattro e cinque scatter. Prima dell’inizio del bonus round, uno dei nove simboli a pagamento regolari viene selezionato come simbolo speciale. Quando c’è abbastanza spazio su un giro libero, essi si espanderanno verticalmente per coprire l’intera bobina e, di conseguenza, vincerai sicuramente a causa dell’aumento di probabilità di combinazioni. Avrai bisogno di almeno tre simboli a basso pagamento o di almeno due simboli premio in qualsiasi punto dello schermo per vederli espandersi e premiare una vittoria.
Questo è, naturalmente, il momento in cui la slot può produrre la massima vincita con un solo giro. Il simbolo speciale selezionato deve essere Lara Jones e se ci sono cinque spazi vuoti sulla Slot, i simboli si espanderanno per pagare 10 volte la vincita di una singola linea per un cinque, che è 500x la puntata, per un totale di 5.000x la puntata.
Non appena tre o più Scatter colpiscono la griglia, preparatevi a entrare in un percorso segreto nel tempio, che porta a dieci o più giri liberi, dato che una sessione può essere recuperata.
Prima di iniziare le rotazioni bonus, una delle icone viene scelta a caso come Espansione, e occasionalmente coprirà l’intera bobina.
Inoltre, Lara può anche imbattersi in serpenti verdi che le mostreranno un modo per fare Snake Spins, in cui da tre a dieci Wilds casuali sono inclusi in ogni rotazione.
La griglia ha cinque bobine, tre file e dieci linee di vincita fisse. Uno Spin può costare da 0,10 centesimi a 100 crediti. Questo permetterà sia i rulli bassi che quelli alti di seguire le strategie di scommessa preferite. Le rotazioni automatiche e i turbo spin sono inclusi.
Il libro è sia lo Scatter che il Wild. Paga fino a 200x la puntata della linea per la sua combinazione di cinque di tipo, e sblocca una caratteristica.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Scoprite la slot Book of Ra Deluxe e giocate per avere la possibilità di vincere fino a 20.000x su due reel-set contemporaneamente.
Ciò che lo rende unico è il reel-set di quattro file e cinque rulli, che è il primo, il secondo è di cinque rulli e 12 file. Con questa disposizione dei reel-set si ottiene un’esperienza di slot leggermente diversa, dove i giocatori possono vedere le vincite su entrambi i lati dello schermo.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Souls
Spearhead Studios, formerly known as GiG Games, the self-proclaimed ‘game changers’, have taken a step forward and added a twist to the classic Book of genre, primarily produced by Novomatic with its Book of Ra. The Snake Wilds are a random feature in the base game where a certain number of Wilds are added at random positions on the reels to provide more potential for scoring a victory.
Book of Souls is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and ten fixed paylines. Bet sizes start from 0.10 credits for the low rollers, while high rollers can increase up to 100 credits. High volatility does not mean low RTP as demonstrated by the study conducted on this Slot Machine, which defined the RTP of the Slot at 96.90%. To keep up with the times, those of Spearhead have optimized the Slot for mobiles, but it looks and plays equally well on a desktop PC.
An Indiana Jones-style graphics
As expected, the slot is adventure-themed, with the hero being Lara Jones who enters an ancient Mayan temple. The archaeologist turned treasure hunter is in search of the mystical Book of Souls, which can unlock the legendary riches hidden within the gigantic stone structure. Of course, on the reels, there is a villain trying to stop Lara from taking home the riches. The game setting is located in front of the entrance to the hidden temple, with pay symbols resting on stones that must be removed to enter. The stones tremble with each new tumble of the paying symbols, so we can already define the presence of Tumbling Reels, while a suspenseful soundtrack raises expectations of finding vast treasures.
The goal of the Slot is to find a sacred Book of Souls - a key to Mayan mysteries and wealth. Alongside Lara, a member of a secret organization is also in search of this source of power, so there is some friction and tension between the protagonist and the antagonist. There are also Mayan sacred masks and totems, as well as stylized card icons.
Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine
All paying symbols are held on giant stones that roll on the game window instead of the usual reel set rotation. The low-value symbols are the Maya-style cards that span a range from 10 to Ace, while the premium symbols are two Maya artifacts, the villain who plays with a gun, and the same Lara Jones. The Slot Machine pays for a single five of a range from 10x to 500x the bet. The ancient Book of Souls, with its intricate design, is the Scatter and Wild symbol on the reels.
Hit at least three scatters anywhere on the reels to trigger 10 free spins, which can be triggered again indefinitely. In addition, a win of 2x, 20 and 200x is awarded for three, four, and five scatters. Before the start of the bonus round, one of the nine regular paying symbols is selected as the special symbol. When there is enough space on a free spin, they will expand vertically to cover the entire reel and, as a result, you will win due to the increased probability of combinations. You will need at least three low-paying symbols or at least two premium symbols anywhere on the screen to see them expand and reward a win.
This is of course the moment when the slot can produce the maximum win with a single spin. The selected special symbol must be Lara Jones, and if there are five empty spaces on the Slot, the symbols will expand to pay 10 times the win of a single line for a five, which is 500x the bet, for a total of 5,000x the bet.
As soon as three or more Scatters hit the grid, get ready to enter a secret path in the temple, which leads to ten or more free spins, as a session can be recovered.
Before starting the bonus spins, one of the icons is randomly chosen as Expansion and will occasionally cover the entire reel.
Moreover, Lara may also come across green snakes that will show her how to make Snake Spins, where from three to ten random Wilds are included in each spin.
The grid has five reels, three rows, and ten fixed paylines. A Spin can cost from 0.10 cents to 100 credits. This will allow both low and high rollers to follow their preferred betting strategies. Automatic spins and turbo spins are included.
The book is both the Scatter and Wild. It pays up to 200x the line bet for its combination of five of a kind and unlocks a feature.
Other similar Slot Machines
Discover the Book of Ra Deluxe slot and play for the chance to win up to 20,000x on two reel sets simultaneously.
What makes it unique is the reel set of four rows and five reels, which is the first one, the second one is five reels and 12 rows. With this arrangement of reel sets, you get a slightly different slot experience, where players can see wins on both sides of the screen.

Book of Souls

Spearhead Studios, formerly known as GiG Games, the self-proclaimed "game changers", have taken a step forward and added a twist to the classic Book of base game, primarily produced by Novomatic with its Book of Ra. The Snake Wilds are a random feature in the base game where a certain number of wilds are added to random positions on the reels to provide more potential for scoring a win.

Book of Souls is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 10 fixed paylines. The betting size starts at 0.10 credits for low rollers, while high rollers can go up to 100 credits. High volatility doesn't mean low RTP as shown by the study conducted on this Slot Machine, which has defined the Slot's RTP at 96.90%. To keep up with the times, Spearhead has optimized the Slot for mobile, but it looks and plays equally well on a desktop PC.

An Indiana Jones-style graphics theme

As expected, the slot has an adventure theme, with the hero being Lara Jones who enters an ancient Mayan temple. The archaeologist turned treasure hunter is searching for the mystical Book of Souls, which can unlock the legendary hidden riches within the massive stone structure. Of course, there is a villain on the reels trying to prevent Lara from taking home the riches. The game's setting is located in front of the entrance to the hidden temple with the pay symbols resting on stones that must be removed to enter. The stones shake with each new cascade of pay symbols, so we can already see the presence of Tumbling Reels, while a suspenseful soundtrack increases the expectations of finding vast treasures.

The objective of the Slot is to find a sacred Book of Souls - a key to the mysteries and riches of the Maya. Alongside Lara, a member of a secret organization is also searching for this source of power, so there is some friction and tension between the protagonist and the antagonist. There are also sacred Mayan masks and totems, as well as stylized card icons.

Slot Machine features and symbols

All the pay symbols are held up on giant stones that roll onto the game window instead of the usual rotation of the reel set. The lowest value symbols are the Maya-style card symbols that range from 10 to Ace, while the premium symbols are two Maya artifacts, the villain wielding a gun, and Lara Jones herself. The Slot Machine pays out for a single five of a range from 10x to 500x the bet. The ancient Book of Souls, with intricate design, is the Scatter and Wild symbol on the reels.

Hit at least three scatters anywhere on the reels to trigger 10 free spins, which can be triggered again indefinitely. Additionally, a win of 2x, 20, and 200x is awarded for three, four, and five scatters. Before the bonus round starts, one of the nine regular paying symbols is selected as the special symbol. When there is enough room on a free spin, they will expand vertically to cover the entire reel and consequently, you will win for sure due to the increased probability of combinations. You will need at least three low-paying symbols or at least two premium symbols anywhere on the screen to see them expand and award a win.

This is, of course, the moment when the slot can produce the maximum payout with a single spin. The special symbol selected must be Lara Jones and if there are five empty spaces on the Slot, the symbols will expand to pay 10 times the single line win for a five, which is 500x the bet, for a total of 5,000x the bet.

As soon as three or more Scatter symbols hit the grid, be ready to enter a secret path in the temple, which leads to ten or more free spins, as a session can be recovered.

Before beginning the bonus spins, one icon is chosen at random as the Expansion, and will occasionally cover the entire reel. Additionally, Lara can also stumble upon green snakes that will show her a way to make Snake Spins, where from three to ten random Wilds are included in each spin.

The grid has five reels, three rows, and ten fixed paylines. One spin can cost from 0.10 cents to 100 credits. This allows both low rollers and high rollers to follow their preferred betting strategies. Automatic spins and turbo spins are included.

The book is both the Scatter and the Wild. It pays up to 200x the line bet for its combination of five of a kind and unlocks a feature.

Similar Slot Machines

Discover the Book of Ra Deluxe slot and play for a chance to win up to 20,000x on two reel-sets simultaneously.

What makes it unique is the reel-set of four rows and five reels, which is the first, the second is five reels and twelve rows. With this reel-set arrangement, players get a slightly different slot experience, where they can see wins on both sides of the screen.
